item.title: Marvel Basketball – The Champion in the Making
item.author: academyibsports@gmail.com (Ishwar Bhati)
item.description: Bhuvanesh Rajagopal shares how training at IB Sports Academy under Coach Ishwar Bhati laid the foundation for his basketball and academic journey. His story reflects the power of discipline, mentorship, and balance.
